name: BLWR
description:
v0.0000002 UPDATE REMOVED THE MILLION BARRELS YOU CAN NOW FALL INTO THE FUSCHIA VOID

Controls:

[W] - Accelerate Forward 
[S] - Reverse
[A][D] - Turning
[SPACE] - Brake
[R] Restart Game
[Z] Spawn More Enemies
[X] Clear All Enemies

Extremely rudimentary prototype. Crash into enemies with your front end to destroy them. Music credit goes to Perturbator, I didn't ask him for permission.
